long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Check if a domain is toxic, and potentially harming your SEO. If so, copy and paste from the extension into your disavow file.
The Colewood Disavow Helper is a free extension by Colewood which helps with identifying harmful domains that could be negatively impacting your SEO. If you believe that you have been affected by a backlink penalty, simply navigate to the website and open the extension; if the website is associated with a known link network, we’ll let you know. 

The Colewood Disavow Helper;
• Runs within the browser and compares the URL against records in our database
• Hundreds of new link networks added to our records monthly
• Will alert the user when a website is navigated to which may, if linking back, incur a backlink penalty for the receiving websites.
• Will generate a rule which can be pasted into your google disavow file

Once the extension has compared the URLs and generated the rule, the user can then simply copy and paste the rule directly into their most recent disavow text file.
The Colewood disavow helper is lightweight, lightning-quick, and receives information from our server on the fly, so you can always be sure you’ll have our most recent records.
